## Attributions
All these classes are taken almost verbatim from [fredhutch.io](https://fredhutchio.github.io/r_intro/), the data and computational analysis training program at [Fred Hutch](https://sciwiki.fredhutch.org/), which was adapted from content originally appearing in [R for data analysis and visualization of Ecological Data](https://datacarpentry.org/R-ecology-lesson/instructor/aio.html), Copyright (c) Data Carpentry.
